item.description:
June 25th, 9am-130pm, Roslindale Village Main Street to host its annual Health and Wellness Day in Adams Park.  Market goers and the community will have access to local providers of health services who will be providing information, demonstrations and activities.  

You will find:

* Rejuvenation in a relaxing Reiki experience

* Relief for symptoms with acupressure

*Tips from nutritionists

*Ask questions of experts on eye health 

* Zumba Dance Activity

* Burn calories with a bootcamp workout

* Guides Pilates Session

 

Carol O'Connor, certified Group Exercise Intructor, Mat Pilates Instructor and Personal Trainer will offer free 15 mini-Bootcamps starting at 11am and 1230pm; mini-pilates classes at 10am and 12pm.  Bring sneakers/mat.  Carol will be launching her new personal training company copilates.

Market goers can participate in a free raffle by dropping their tickets into the raffle jar on the Health and Wellness table(s) of their choice(s).  Raffles will close at 1pm; winners will be announced by 1:30, before market closing. Prizes include:

*Two $50.00 gift certificates & 4 sets of sunglasses with UV protection by New England Eye

*Bike helmet from Boston Medical Center

* $125 gift certificate for one first-time acupuncture session with Karen Kirchoff

* One hour Personal Training with copilates owner Carol O'Connor

  Davey the Clown will make his second appearance at the market at 10 am. After you visit the Health and Wellness tents and exhibits, enjoy the music of Moniker from 11am to 1pm and up to 20 other specialty vendors including 8 farms.      For more information, go to the Roslindale Village Main Street website at: www.roslindale.net
item.how_to_find_us: Washington Street and Cummings Highway in Roslindale
item.name: Health & Wellness Day at Roslindale 's Farmers Market
